description:
## The Trading Collectors Card
##
The Trading Collectors Card can get by the first 10 Collectors who collect a full Regular Card Deck or own a Regular Collectors Card AND collect the fully set of the 10 Community Hero Cards. 
This means that you have to own all 100 cards of the regular deck min. once or alternatively you have a Regular Collectors Card.
If you have this you also need to collect all 10 Cards of the Community Hero expansion pack min once.
##
The Card limitation is not relevant for this Collectors Card. You only have to collect all cards (named above) AND be under the first 10 Collectors who participate the Trading Collectors Award on Soonaverse.
##
If you have participated please let me some time to check if everything is correct and you collect all cards. Definitely you will get it if everything is correct. First comes, first serve for sure.
##
After you get your Trading Collectors Award you can come back and get your Trading Collectors Card for free (1Mi for dust protection).
##
## Limited to 10 Cards which never will be sold by iotatradingcards.com
name: IOTA Trading Cards - Trading Collector
